title: Why can't my B1 count my steps accurately?
answer:
Huawei TalkBand uses advanced algorithm to count your steps. The R&D team has compared Huawei TalkBand with other wearables. In terms of counting steps of normal walking and running, Huawei TalkBand has the best performance among similar products and meets your step counting requirements.

For counting your steps, each kind of wearables has requirements on your walking gestures. Not all walking steps can be counted. No wearable can count your steps 100% correct. Even you yourself can count your steps wrong. Even though Huawei TalkBand has achieved a very satisfactory performance in counting steps, the R&D team is still making every effort to optimize this product.
